issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Seal of an eagle attacking a heron with motto EXITUS IN DUBIO EST (The outcome is in doubt).
issue_obverse_legend_s: Continental Currency. | The United Colonies | THREE DOLLARS | THREE DOLLARS. THIS Bill entitles the BEARER to receive Three SPANISH milled DOLLARS, or the Value thereof in Gold or Silver, according to a Resolution of CONGRESS, passed at Philadelphia, July 22, 1776.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Nature print of elm and maple fruit leaves.
issue_reverse_legend_s: THREE DOLLARS. | Philadelphia: PRINTED BY Hall & Sellers. 1776.
